name: UpdateIncidentNotificationRule
description:
Update an incident notification rule in Datadog.

This tool updates an existing incident notification rule in Datadog with a complete replacement. Use it when you need to modify the settings or parameters of an incident alert rule.

parameters.name: notification_rule_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the notification rule to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the notification rule.

parameters.name: notification_rule_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the complete notification rule data to update. It includes attributes, relationships, and the type for the notification rule.

values.description: The value(s) to compare against. Multiple values are `ORed` together.

conditions.description: The conditions that trigger this notification rule.

enabled.description: Whether the notification rule is enabled.

handles.description: The notification handles (targets) for this rule.

renotify_on.description: List of incident fields that trigger re-notification when changed.

trigger.description: The trigger event for this notification rule.

visibility.description: The visibility of the notification rule.

attributes.description: The attributes for creating a notification rule.

id.description: The unique identifier of the notification rule.
The unique identifier of the notification template.

notification_template.description: A relationship reference to a notification template.

data.description: Notification rule data for an update request.

parameters.name: include_resources
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resources to include: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`, `notification_template`.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of resources to include. Supported values: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`, `notification_template`
